sect3.title: Configuration of exim
sect3.para: Create the exim configuration files with the following commands:

screen.userinput: cat >> /etc/aliases << "EOF" postmaster: root MAILER-DAEMON: root EOF exim -v -bi /usr/sbin/exim -bd -q1m

note.para: To protect an existing /etc/aliases file, we will append these aliases to it if it exists. This file should be checked and duplicate aliases removed, if present.

sect3.para: To start and stop exim on system boot/shutdown create the exim boot script with the following commands:
Create the run level symlinks with the following commands:

screen.userinput: cd /etc/rc.d/init.d && ln -sf ../init.d/exim ../rc0.d/K25exim && ln -sf ../init.d/exim ../rc1.d/K25exim && ln -sf ../init.d/exim ../rc2.d/K25exim && ln -sf ../init.d/exim ../rc3.d/S35exim && ln -sf ../init.d/exim ../rc4.d/S35exim && ln -sf ../init.d/exim ../rc5.d/S35exim && ln -sf ../init.d/exim ../rc6.d/K25exim
